message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand that $200 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $180? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure if $180 is the best fit for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it brings.

I understand that $180 was a stretch, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. How about we meet in the middle at $160? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
I'm still not sure if $160 is the best fit for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not willing to go below $155. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it!
